original: 蜀漢將領。歷史上相關記載不多，僅知其多任地方郡守。李嚴怠忽職守、假傳戰況時，隨諸葛亮聯名上書，彈劾李嚴。後亦曾抵禦曹爽侵蜀。
text: Shuhan generals. There are not many related records in history, but many of them are known as local county guards. When Li Yannour neglected his duty and falsely reported the situation of the battle, he joined Zhuge Liang in a letter to impeach Li Yan. Later, he also resisted Cao Shuang's invasion of Shu.
